item.description:
Meet at the Tides Restaurant for a Blood Mary to start the ride (just kidding...well, maybe not:-).  Parking at the lot in front of the beach I think is like $5 a day...We'll ride through Swampscott and eventually make our way to Beverly.

Ride Length 30-35 miles long

Speed: Average 12 mph

Bring a swim suit for a possible swim.  We'll stop for lunch along the way....

Bring a bike in good working order (tune up recommended if you haven't had one this year), a spare tire that fits your bike, water, snack/energy food, sunscreen, and a zest for fun!

...more details to follow.

 

We'll likely be done by @ 4pm

Road bike or Hybrid recommended....a mountain bike if you're in good shape only.
item.how_to_find_us: My cell on the day of the ride is 617-894-8454
item.name: North Shore Ride - Nahant/Swampscott/Marblehead/Beverly
